project_specific_ipynb_code.hot_zone.get_branching_depth_series¶

project_specific_ipynb_code.hot_zone.get_branching_depth_series(cell)[source]¶

Careful: z-depth only accurate for D2-registered cells!

returns a series that contains the pia distance as index and a tuple (biforcation order, section) as value
